title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 511, subpt. 511-2 - Children's Mental Health Rehabilitation Services Program

York State Register July 17, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 29, eff. 7/17/2019

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law §§ 7.09, 31,04, 43.02; Social Services Law §§ 364(3), 364-a(1), 364-j. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
